DOC.brief_summary: This study aim examine effectiveness three different way help patient attend recommend eye care appointment .
DOC.brief_title: Improving Follow-Up Adherence Primary Eye Care Setting
DOC.detailed_description: The three way 1 ) usual care , involve standard reminder letter ; 2 ) automate telephone call , utilizes machine automatically call patient one month prior recommend follow-up date ; 3 ) personalize telephone call , utilizes staff member personally call patient offer opportunity schedule time telephone call .
DOC.criteria: Age : Over 18 year Primary Eye Care Patients recommend 6month , 12month , 24month followup appointment September 2013 November 2013 . Access telephone Does speak English
